name: Addition of SID History to Active Directory Object
description: An attacker can use the SID history attribute to gain additional privileges.
false_positives: Migration of an account into a new domain
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:(4765 OR 4766) OR ((event.code:4738 AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.SidHistory:(\- OR %%1793)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.SidHistory)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:(4765 OR 4766) OR ((event.code:4738 AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.SidHistory:(\- OR %%1793)))) AND (NOT (NOT _exists_:winlog.event_data.SidHistory)))))`
